document.full_text: a french airliner plunged out of control for four minutes before crashing into the atlantic in 2009, investigators said, in a report raising questions about how crew handled a "stall alarm" blaring out in the cabin.
document.title: air france crash sparks pilot mystery
lines_and_colors: a french airliner plunged out of control for four minutes before crashing into the atlantic in 2009, investigators said, in a report raising questions about how crew handled a "stall alarm" blaring out in the cabin.
